title: Game-Based Mathematical Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level mathematical concepts and practical application experience
context.additional_context: A course designed to help practitioners intuitively understand complex mathematical concepts through game mechanics and creatively apply them to real-world problems

learning_goals: Analyze and interpret ≥3 advanced mathematical models (statistics, optimization, probability) using game-based simulations
Improve collaboration and decision-making abilities by ≥20% during mathematical problem-solving processes through team-based game activities
Develop and evaluate ≥5 real-world business cases applying game mechanics

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
